SEARCH
Module edu.ufp.inf
Package edu.ufp.inf.ManageGraphs

Class AuthorsGraph<A extends Author,P extends Paper>

java.lang.Object
edu.ufp.inf.ManageGraphs.AuthorsGraph<A,P>
Type Parameters:
A - The type of authors.
P - The type of papers.
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class AuthorsGraph<A extends Author,P extends Paper> extends Object implements Serializable
Represents a graph structure that connects authors. The edges represent the co-author connection
See Also:

    • numberCoAuthors

      public int numberCoAuthors(Author a)
      Calculates the number of co-authors for a given author. Time Complexity: O(V), where V is the number of adjacent vertices to the given author in the graph. Extra Space: O(V), where V is the number of adjacent vertices to the given author in the graph.
      Parameters:
      a - The author for which to calculate the number of co-authors.
      Returns:
      The number of co-authors.

    • numberCoAuthors

      public void numberCoAuthors(Author a, String fn)
      Calculates the number of co-authors for a given author and output to txt file. Time Complexity: O(V), where V is the number of adjacent vertices to the given author in the graph. Extra Space: O(V), where V is the number of adjacent vertices to the given author in the graph.
      Parameters:
      a - The author for which to calculate the number of co-authors.

    • numPapersBetweenAuthors

      public int numPapersBetweenAuthors(Author a1, Author a2)
      Calculates the number of papers co-authored by both given authors. Time Complexity: O(E), where E is the number of edges (papers) between the two authors. Extra Space: O(1)
      Parameters:
      a1 - The first author.
      a2 - The second author.
      Returns:
      The number of papers co-authored by both authors.

    • numPapersBetweenAuthors

      public void numPapersBetweenAuthors(Author a1, Author a2, String fn)
      Calculates the number of papers co-authored by both given authors an doutput to txt file. Time Complexity: O(E), where E is the number of edges (papers) between the two authors. Extra Space: O(1)
      Parameters:
      a1 - The first author.
      a2 - The second author.
      fn - file name

    • subGraphAuthorsFilter

      public AuthorsGraph<A,Paper> subGraphAuthorsFilter(String affiliation)
      Generates a subgraph containing authors with the given affiliation. Time Complexity: O(V + E), where V is the number of authors with the specified affiliation and E is the number of edges in the resulting subgraph. Extra Space: O(V), where V is the number of authors with the specified affiliation.
      Parameters:
      affiliation - The affiliation to filter authors.
      Returns:
      A subgraph containing authors with the specified affiliation, or null if no authors match the affiliation.

    • subGraphAuthorsFilter

      public void subGraphAuthorsFilter(String affiliation, String fn)
      Generates a subgraph containing authors with the given affiliation and output to txt. Time Complexity: O(V + E), where V is the number of authors with the specified affiliation and E is the number of edges in the resulting subgraph. Extra Space: O(V), where V is the number of authors with the specified affiliation.
      Parameters:
      affiliation - The affiliation to filter authors.
      fn - file name

    • minimumHopsBetweenAuthors

      public Integer minimumHopsBetweenAuthors(A author1, A author2)
      Finds the minimum number of hops (edges) between two vertices in the graph. Time Complexity: O(V + E), where V is the number of vertices and E is the number of edges in the graph. It performs a breadth-first search traversal to find the minimum number of hops between two vertices. Extra Space: O(V). It uses additional space for the boolean array marked[], the edgeTo[] array, and the distTo[] array.
      Parameters:
      author1 - from author1
      author2 - to author2
      Returns:
      The minimum number of hops between the vertices, or -1 if there is no path between them.

    • minimumHopsBetweenAuthors

      public void minimumHopsBetweenAuthors(A author1, A author2, String fn)
      Finds the minimum number of hops (edges) between two vertices in the graph and output to txt file. Time Complexity: O(V + E), where V is the number of vertices and E is the number of edges in the graph. It performs a breadth-first search traversal to find the minimum number of hops between two vertices. Extra Space: O(V). It uses additional space for the boolean array marked[], the edgeTo[] array, and the distTo[] array.
      Parameters:
      author1 - from author1
      author2 - to author2
      fn - file name

    • listVertexAuthorAffilliation

      public ArrayList<String> listVertexAuthorAffilliation(String affiliation)
      Lists the vertex IDs of authors belonging to a specific affiliation. Time Complexity: O(N) N = number of entries in authorsMap Extra Space: O(M) M = number of authors with the specified affiliation
      Parameters:
      affiliation - The affiliation to search for.
      Returns:
      arr ArrayList of strings

    • listVertexAuthorAffilliation

      public void listVertexAuthorAffilliation(String affiliation, String fn)
      Lists the vertex IDs of authors belonging to a specific affiliation and output to txt Time Complexity: O(N) N = number of entries in authorsMap Extra Space: O(M) M = number of authors with the specified affiliation
      Parameters:
      affiliation - The affiliation to search for.
      fn - filename
